content:
This system of two linear equations is graphed below.

$\qquad\green{y=3x-5}$

$\qquad\pink{2y+4x=5}$

**Create a new equation by substituting $y$ from the upper equation into the lower equation.**  
(Be sure to expand the new equation and combine like terms.)
[[☃ expression 1]]

The solution to the original system of equations [[☃ dropdown 1]] a solution to the new equation.

**Graph the new equation below using the third line.**  

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
